website_summaries.verdict: With daily use, you will see the improvement in your skin in as little as a week.
pros: Results in as soon as a week with regular use
Softens skin and minimizes the appearance of fine lines
Moisturizes without making your skin greasy
cons: More expensive than the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I received this a week ago and began using it immediately. It’s a bit greasy and thick but I was using too much product at first. I got up this morning, looked in the mirror and the wrinkles around my mouth are less noticeable. I can’t believe this stuff works but it really does! To me, it’s a bit greasy to wear in the mornings under your moisturizer so I may only use at night. But I’m definitely going to keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. At first, it took a little getting used to. The consistency is thick and looks and feels oily and a little goes a long way, but after only three days of use at night, my skin has been transformed. I'm 58 with fine lines and wrinkles and this product has changed my skin texture to a smooth, soft surface. I would recommend to not use in the AM, but as a PM serum under your moisturizer. Give about 10-15 minutes before a moisturizer. You will wake up with renewed skin. The scent isn't the best, but I'm getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Shear

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed especially considering the cost of the item
customer_reviews.text: tried this for 6 months and noticed no difference whatsoever. Very disappointed especially considering the cost of the item.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY, REALLY WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first about their claim of "visibly reduces lines and stubborn deep wrinkles in 7 days", but YES, it worked for me!! In less than a week I saw my wrinkles around my forehead, eye area, and my "parentheses" melt away. Be careful though. The first time I did it I didn't read the instructions and wound up with a face full of oil. :( You need to clean your face first, then use only a little, rub between your hands, and then press against the areas you are looking treat. If you follow the instructions you will be super happy with the results like I am! It Really, Really Works as advertised!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Herraiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have deep wrinkle lines on my chest and it is almost gone.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Biesk

customer_reviews.title: There should always be a safety strip on top of bottle and an expectation date.
customer_reviews.text: Received the product no security strip which is always the top on bottle over the pump. I love the product ordered in past no problem . This one didnt have security strip. I'm returning it in case it has been returned and resold.

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Absorbs nicely and within a few days of using I noticed that my fine wrinkles looked less noticeable. Will definitely order again.

customer_reviews.title: Dependableiii
customer_reviews.text: I have used StriVectin on my face for many years and find it is the best wrinkle reducer that I have found. I am 77 and look 57 which is a blessing to me. Thank you for carrying the brand.

customer_reviews.title: This anti wrinkle product truly does work.
customer_reviews.text: I am 66 years old and one of the best complements for me is when a person says to me that I don’t look my age. I believe Stri Vectin anti wrinkle has help me achieve this complement.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: At age 71, I wake up with lines here and there. I apply the wrinkle serum, topped off with StriVectin tightening face cream and the lines disappear. Thank you StriVectin!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: StriVectin is great but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I really really love this, it is awesome. Great results but just not enough product for this price. It lasted me a month and a half and I don’t care for the “pump”. No way to fully open or cut it to get the remaining product. I guess I’ll have to wait until the next Prime Day to get the great discount again. :-(

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the miracle
customer_reviews.text: Very greasy texture which does not absorb quickly or completely. Used it for months, bought it again because of the strivectin reputation but honestly I did not see any improvement to skin texture or wrinkles whatsoever. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Assinie

customer_reviews.title: Great for deep wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product . It is no quick fix to repair deep wrinkles and this does the job . I have been using this morning/night for 4 months . This product does work and it needs time so do not expect to see results after 30 days it will take minimum of 12 weeks for you to notice a different appearance in your deep lines . This is really worth it .
customer_reviews.author: LA LA

customer_reviews.title: Once you start using this you'll never want to be without it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a year now. I ran out of it recently and using something less expensive. After only a couple weeks I could tell the difference so I'm happy to be using it again. I'm 74 and people never guess my age.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy with product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very thick and oily and does not absorb into skin, I have not seen any difference in my skin but that:s just me, everybody is different. I am so angry with myself missing the 30 day cut off for return, now I'm stuck with product and it was really expensive
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My face feels amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love the silky feel after I apply the Recode Line Transforming cream . Easy to dispense pump and with just a dab , it covers and hydrates your entire face making it feel silky , smooth and moisturized .I use it both night and day and I'm loving the long lasting glow of my skin.My face feels amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Rico

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep up its promise
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but this item is expensive and makes great promises to reduce fine lines and wrinkles in 7 days days. I have used this religiously, according to directions for over 3 weeks now and see zero improvement in my skin. Don't waste your money! There are better products out there. Bobbi
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Virtue

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I know that you really can't reverse wrinkles, but I hoped maybe they could be less visible. This product has not done that. I don't think it actually does anything. I have used it as directed twice daily for several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost.. $$$
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend for women under 40. It's very thick & it's not fully absorb. In the mornings my skin will still feel greasy. Perhaps it works with very, very deep wrinkles? I didn't noticed much of a difference. It feels uncomfortable when applied, even a small amount.. Not worth the cost. Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: LGonz

customer_reviews.title: StriVectin
customer_reviews.text: I love all the product line. Love that you barely have to use a pea sized drop to color your whole face.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for older skin !
customer_reviews.text: But spendy but strivectin is a great product. I use it and also dermalogica as staples.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It keeps my skin hydrated day and night and I have a very dry skin. Definitely helps keeping the skin smooth.

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed.  Probably returned products.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived unsealed. I called to get an unopened one, which I did get quickly. I was told to discard the unsealed one, which I did, but was then charged for both products.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.text: This product does not work and does not remove or lessen wrinkles like it says it should. Just another gimmick and I'm sorry I spent so much money on it.

customer_reviews.text: did not see any difference from the first day to last. Gave it 3 weeks with no change at all.

customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. Less than 1 week and small lines between my eyes were smoother. I only use it at night because it has a heavier texture or thickness than a regular cream or serum. It has a slight minty or botanical smell but is pleasant
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Rose

customer_reviews.title: I read so many good reviews but I did not find them to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I read so many good reviews but I did not find them to be true. Save your money because this product does not live up to all the hype,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started using it and had a bad rash in my face
customer_reviews.text: Hello; was so excited when got my product. Started using it and had a bad rash in my face. Used it twice and had to put it away. Looks like my skin is burned and itchy. Had to wash my face with cold water, to calm the skin. So sad, after paying so much money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Good product when you can't get it anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Strivectin is really a great product for those wrinkles. While it doesn't get rid of the wrinkles, it does soften the look and works great with the anti-wrinkle cream that I always use. My skin has improved and looks younger than my age. I will be 57 this year and many people ask me what I use for my skin and that I look younger than my age. That's a compliment in itself. Use good products like Strivectin and you will look years younger. It's kinda expensive, but when you see it on sale on other websites, grab it, because it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Poipugirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This serum is the best, well worth every penny. I'm on my third bottle and will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Minimal benefit
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying I may be too far gone for this product to have done much good. I'm well into my 60's and it shows; mostly around my eyes. I used this as directed for over two weeks. I learned early on that a little goes a long way. If you use too much it will stay on the surface of your skin and doesn't completely absorb into the wrinkles. I had some minimal improvement, mostly around my eyes. The deeper wrinkles seemed less deep and some of the smaller wrinkles improved a bit. Nothing that anyone would really notice. Certainly worth a try but I'm no longer using it.
customer_reviews.author: JoeTAZ

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Absorb Into My Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: This product feels very different from other such products. I'm not sure how to describe it: not like a cream or lotion, not a petroleum jelly feel, and not greasy... almost feels dry. For 2 weeks I have used it twice daily exactly as suggested and have not seen a reduction in fine lines and certainly no reduction in the deeper wrinkles. It does not seem to absorb into my dry skin. Hours after I use it if I scratch my face my finger gets a greasy film on it even though I only used the miniscule amount recommended. Darn! I was hoping for a minor miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Whidbey Mary

customer_reviews.title: it's a lot worst. Obaji serums work better
customer_reviews.text: Smells a bit minty and strongly reminds me a lot of the common green Asian rubbing ointment. If I'm not going out, I've been using this twice a day for several months. I haven't seen much difference whether I use it or not. Compared to Obaji serum, it's a lot worst. Obaji serums work better. One of the problems with this serum is that it gives a shiny greasy look that doesn't dissipate until you accidentally rub it off. Not pleasant for your pillow case, nor is it that appealing for others to see you with a shiny greasy face.
customer_reviews.author: Fathom

customer_reviews.title: Smooths over skin really well, interesting texture that I like a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the texture of this product and have never seen anything like it before. It's sort of like a thick jelly but it smooths over your skin very easily and, I think, better than liquids because you can move it around a bit before it soaks in. I've had no adverse reactions or breakouts and my skin does feel smoother and the texture looks better. There's no scent or stinging. The pump works well and doesn't put out more than you need. Two pumps is about right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Figueredo

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few months now and I really love it. I have very sensitive skin, and I really have to be cautious about any new product I put on my face :) This serum is clear, thick, goes on thick and smells a little minty. It does not soak in quick, so nighttime is the best time to put this on. I have noticed that it has absolutely made my face smoother, I dont know about "recoding" my wrinkles, but it has definitely refined my lines.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Henri

customer_reviews.title: noticeable difference in from line reduction after a week of use
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for a week I noticed significant results in the reduction of my frown lines and the overall smoothness of my skin. The serum its literally sticky and also tick, which really gives it the impression of acting like a sealant and tighter. I was very pleased with the overall results after two week.
customer_reviews.author: rareoopdvds

customer_reviews.title: Gel-Like Serum, Very Nourishing, Slight Peppermint Scent
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying the StriVectin Anti-Wrinkle Line Transforming Melting Serum. You can use it morning and night but I use it at night only. It does seem to be slightly slippery on the skin, I won’t say greasy because it is different but nonetheless, it seems to affect my makeup wear when I wear makeup over it. It is a gel like serum that to me has a slight peppermint essential oil scent to it. I love how nourishing it feels on my skin. It does leave my skin looking like I’ve put something oily or greasy on it so again, I only use it in the PM.
customer_reviews.author: ⛵⚓Seas the Day⚓⛵

customer_reviews.title: It has helped with the very fine lines. Kind of plumps the skin
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the StriVectin Wrinkle Recode Line Transforming Melting Serum, 1 Fl. oz. This maker is the gold standard for skin treatments, but you probably knew that already if you are looking at this product. Took a few days of treatments before I could see some results, but the glow it gives I had from day one. I guess this is another example of you get what you pay for. It has helped with the very fine lines. Kind of plumps the skin up
customer_reviews.author: Professor H

customer_reviews.title: We like this as a moisturizer but no noticable effect in removing under-eye wrinkles.
customer_reviews.text: This feels nice but we don't think we can tell the difference in terms of wrinkles. We were hoping for some reduction in the under-eye smile wrinkles but we haven't seen a difference even though we've be using this for a month. Feels wonderful, though.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel's Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Too oily for daytime wear
customer_reviews.text: I am lucky that I have very few wrinkles at age 68. That said, there are a few I was hoping this would help. Perhaps it will, but the product is quite oily/greasy and does not absorb into my skin. I have tried multiple times to use it before applying makeup, but even though I tried less and less each time, I always have to wipe it off or everything smears. However, since so many reviewers rave about it, I am going to use it at night only and see how well that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Caraleisa

customer_reviews.title: Ok but takes a long time for results
customer_reviews.text: A little bit greasy, but easy to apply. I don't see much results. I an guessing I will have to use the entire container before any results are visible.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nectar of the Gods
customer_reviews.text: A velvety texture creating a silicone line smooth on your face under make up or just natural look I got it as sample and am hooked. Buy their line of items and never look back. These are skin defining products

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy and has nice smell. Wish that it absorbed quicker in skin

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle reducer
customer_reviews.text: Horrible item. Very, very greasy. Absolutely NO results!!! Waste of money

customer_reviews.title: good but feel formula changed
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very nice but i think the formula changed. I feel like i need more of it to work. Too expensive to have to need 2 or 3 pumps
customer_reviews.author: LuvMyGolden

customer_reviews.title: product did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used it faithfully and as directed No difference at all
